name: Cucumber-reporting-handlebars
body: # cucumber reporting with bootstrap components and handlebars as template engine Latest released version: [![Build Status](https://secure.travis-ci.org/BogdanLivadariu/cucumber-reporting-handlebars.png)](http://travis-ci.org/BogdanLivadariu/cucumber-reporting-handlebars) This is a module to generate cucumber html reports from cucumber.json files, using handlebars to compute the HTML, and bootstrap components to render the HTML content. Feature report summary
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
